email.subject: New York State Board of Elections Military and Overseas Voter Registration: your voter registration site login has been changed
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

While filling out your Register to Vote information, you entered an email address that was different from the email address that you entered before (that was used as your login for My Voter Account).

Your login has been updated and now it is $!newLogin. Your old login $!oldLogin will no longer work.

If there are any inaccuracies or mistakes, feel free to Contact us at any time.

Thank you for choosing the Military and Overseas Voter Registration site and services to register to vote and request your ballot for the upcoming elections!

Contact us at anytime with questions and comments
